item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Academic makes it easy to create a beautiful website for free using Markdown. Customize anything on your site with widgets, themes, and language packs. [] [] [] [] License Copyright 2016-present George Cushen. Released under the MIT license.
